title: SHADOW.
description:
After the events of Comic-Con, Build-A-Bear starts to realise that his freedom is over when an unexpected project arrives. To stop it, Build-A-Bear forms a team of people to take down the project, known as Project: Shadow. 
**Releasing on YT August 15**
**Releasing on LPF+ August 27**

title: Beluga Gets Ready
description:
When Hecker is taken by an elite force security team, Beluga is once again given another curse to change into different forms. With this, he teams up with a random skilled vigilante to help get Hecker back. 
**Releasing on YT October 17**
**Releasing on LPF+ November 1**

title: The Melon Sandbox Movie 2
description:
After the battle of the killers, Melon meets Corn, and soon finds out that Corn is friends with Apple, his original boss.
**Releasing on YT 2026**
**Releasing on LPF+ 2026**

title: Smudge's Adventures Episode 10
description: **EPISODE 10 COMING SOON**/nSmudge & Pod, two ordinary cats, live their best lifes in Cat Kingdom. But their adventures are interrupted by Evil Cat, the demonic leader of the evil kitty army, who sets out plans to defeat Smudge for good.
